actions.text: Reported by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 102-542.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 316.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minuets of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To amend the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund.

summary.text: Amends the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund through FY 1997.

titles.title: To amend the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund.
